Lista de tarefas

Suas tarefas:

  • {{item.description}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'todo'; filter: 'all' | 'active' | 'done' = 'all'; allItems = [ { description: 'comer', done: true }, { description: 'dormir', done: false }, { description: 'jogar', done: false }, ]; get items() { if (this.filter === 'all') { return this.allItems; } return this.allItems.filter((item) => this.filter === 'done' ? item.done : !item.done); } addItem(description: string) { this.allItems.unshift({ description, done: false }); } }
